thought: To craft a prismarine brick slab, I need to place three prismarine bricks in a row in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the prismarine bricks from slot 32 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1
